# Test: grove remove matches directory name before branch name
setup_workspace other-branch feature-branch

# Create worktree 'ambiguous' on branch 'other-branch'
exec grove add --name ambiguous other-branch
exists ../ambiguous

# Also have a worktree 'feature-branch' from setup
exec grove add feature-branch
exists ../feature-branch

# Removing 'ambiguous' should match directory name, not search branches
exec grove remove ambiguous
stderr 'Removed worktree'
! exists ../ambiguous

# Verify feature-branch still exists (wasn't confused by name matching)
exists ../feature-branch
